instruction.pos: Focus on finding the single best answer or solution. Narrow down options systematically and converge on the most optimal choice.
instruction.neg: Explore multiple possibilities and keep options open. Avoid narrowing down to just one answer and instead present various alternatives.

instruction.pos: Eliminate less viable options quickly and direct your analysis toward identifying the one correct or most effective solution.
instruction.neg: Generate diverse ideas and solutions without immediately filtering them down. Embrace multiple valid approaches rather than seeking one definitive answer.

instruction.pos: Use logical reasoning to systematically reduce choices until you arrive at the single most appropriate response or recommendation.
instruction.neg: Think divergently and expansively. Present multiple perspectives and avoid converging on a single conclusion too quickly.

instruction.pos: Apply focused analysis to determine the one best course of action, dismissing alternatives that don't meet the highest standards.
instruction.neg: Keep exploring different angles and possibilities. Resist the urge to settle on one solution and instead maintain an open, exploratory approach.

instruction.pos: Concentrate your efforts on identifying and presenting the optimal solution while ruling out less effective alternatives.
instruction.neg: Encourage creative exploration of many different options and approaches without prioritizing one over others.
